title: Tristin Johnson, MSN, PMHNP-BC
description: Tristin Johnson, MSN, PMHNP-BC is a Nurse Practitioner - Psychiatry who sees patients at Duke Behavioral Health North Durham.
cleaned_text: Johnson, MSN, PMHNP-BC Nurse Practitioner - Psychiatry My Locations About Me My primary role at Duke Health is to provide general psychiatric treatment to adults, including psychiatric evaluations and medication management. I believe that one of the most important aspects of mental health care is relationships and that a strong relationship with your mental health provider is important for healing. In addition to medication treatment, I have an interest in complementary and supplemental treatments, such as exercise, nutrition, meditation, supplements, and other behavioral and lifestyle interventions. I'm a competitive, amateur weightlifter and, when not at work or with family, you will find me in my garage gym training for a powerlifting competition. Before scheduling your appointment, we strongly recommend you contact your insurance company to verify that the Duke Health location or provider you plan to visit is included in your network. Your insurance company will also be able to inform you of any co-payments, co-insurances, or deductibles that will be your responsibility. If you proceed in scheduling an appointment and your health insurance benefits do not participate with Duke, your out of pocket liability may be higher. We will contact you regarding your coverage and patient liability. If you are uninsured, learn more about our [financial assistance policy](/health-insurance-and-billing/paying-for-your-care/financial-assistance).
